entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -4.8°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
